project.teaser: PAROMA-MED will develop, validate and evaluate a platform - based hybrid-cloud delivery framework for privacy- and security- assured services and applications in federative cross-border environments.To this purpose, the project will develop new architectures, technologies...
project.objective:
PAROMA-MED will develop, validate and evaluate a platform - based hybrid-cloud delivery framework for privacy- and security- assured services and applications in federative cross-border environments. To this purpose, the project will develop new architectures, technologies, tools and services to support: - automatic attestation of federation partners - privacy- and security - by-design, integrating standard compliance and performance / QoS requirements into a policy framework - consumers with their rights for opt-in / opt-out consent, portability and right to be forgotten requests, as well as transparency in access to their private-data. - federative Identity and Access Management, based on Zero Trust principles, continuous risk assessment and on confidentiality, integrity and authenticity insurance - privacy-preserving and trusted data - storage and - processing in federative environments - flexible and secure access over the Internet to private-data and service resources - AI / ML by-design, integrating platform services to be used by application developers for data-intensive applications - Zero Touch deployment and automatic life-cycle management of services and applications - managed Privacy and Security operations for automated policy enforcement and cyberthreat detection and mitigation
Efficiency and scalability will be insured by the implementation of cloud-native solutions, while future adoption and further development is insured by open-source implementations.
The project will validate and evaluate the PAROMA-MED framework by developing of a comprehensive Use Case with real users in the Healthcare sector.
The project will create impact on the application- creation and delivery ecosystem (including standardization and legal stakeholders), on society and environment and manage the impact via dedicated activities and communication channels.

result.title: Federated machine learning through edge ready architectures with privacy preservation as a service

details.authors: Anastasius Gavras; Konstantinos Koutsopoulos; Stefan Covaci; Benjamin Ertl; Spyridon Tompros; Antoine Simon; Gouenou Coatrieux; Katarzyna Kapista

result.title: Chapter 2: Architecture and design choices for federated learning in modern digital healthcare systems

details.authors: Konstantinos A. Koutsopoulos, Christoph Thümmler, Angelica Avila Castillo, Alice Abend, Stefan Covaci, Benjamin Ertl, Giannis Ledakis, Stéphane Lorin, Vincent Thouvenot, Sahar Haddad, Gouenou Coatrieux, Reda Bellafqira, Alessandro Bassi

result.title: Setup of communication and dissemination media
result.description: Report about the first communication and dissemination activities, such as the public website and leaflet; it includes the project vision, objectives, activities, expected outcomes and benefits, and points of contact. Project accounts on selected social media.

result.title: 1st Report and updated plan for communication, clustering, dissemination
result.description: These Deliverables will list the communication, clustering, standardization, and dissemination actions implemented every year by the Project. They will update the roadmap in D5.1 in case some targets become not feasible or do not bring the expected impact. The delivery of the three reports have been scheduling according to the expected intensity of dissemination activities (likely more concentrated in the second part of the Project, when more achievements and results will be available).

result.title: Chapter 4: Recent Advances in federated learning for digital healthcare systems

details.authors: Pooja Mohnani, Christoph Thümmler, Angelica Avila Castillo, Rasha Tolba, Alessandro Bassi, Antoine Simon, Anastasius Gavras, Orazio Toscano, Pascal Haigron

result.title: Concept and Evaluation Framework - first version
result.description: This report will provide the first version of the platform architecture and the related evaluation methodology (T1.2 and T1.3).

result.title: When Federated Learning Meets Watermarking: A Comprehensive Overview of Techniques for Intellectual Property Protection

details.authors: Mohammed Lansari; Vincent Thouvenot; Katarzyna Kapusta; Gouenou Coatrieux; Reda Bellafqira; Olivier Bettan

result.title: Security and Privacy Awareness - ver. 1
result.description: This report collects and presents all the security and privacy awareness concepts and models defined and developed in tasks T3.3. This document reports on the first iteration of the concepts and models defined and developed as well as a first prototype GUI for situational awareness.

result.title: Network and Interconnect Platform - ver. 1
result.description: This report collects and presents the outcomes related to the network and interconnecting platform focusing in particular about the privacy-aware Network Slices conceived, designed and implemented to assure an interconnectivity privacy level compliant with the project requirements. This report freezes the current status in the mid-lifespan of the project.

result.title: Concept and Evaluation Framework - final version
result.description: This document will detail the updated version of the platform architecture and the related evaluation methodology as refined through the progress of the technical work performed in other WPs (T1.2 and T1.3).

result.title: Federated vs. centralized learning for medical images classification and segmentation

details.authors: Irina Rakotoarisedy, Adam Fragkiadakis, Pascal Haigron, Antoine Simon

result.title: Access and Privacy Control Architecture and Models
result.description: This report presents the models and the resulting architecture for access and privacy control within the PAROMA architecture. The documentation about the implementation will be part of deliverable D2.3.

result.title: Roadmap for communication, dissemination, standardization activities
result.description: This report will provide an overview of the strategy and the main actions to be implemented for communication, dissemination, standardization, clustering. It will describe relevant targets for communication/dissemination, together with the appropriate means to reach them. The roadmap will be updated yearly according to the specific achievements and relevant changes in context and objectives.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
